name: 古列尔莫·马可尼
bio_short: 意大利发明家和电气工程师，因开创了“长距离无线电传输”（`marconi_radio_1895`）而闻名于世。他将赫兹的物理发现转变为一项全球通信技术，并因此获得了1909年的诺贝尔物理学奖。
bio_short_en: An Italian inventor and electrical engineer, known for pioneering 'long-distance radio transmission' (`marconi_radio_1895`). He turned Hertz's physics discovery into a practical, global technology, for which he won the 1909 Nobel Prize in Physics.
